
# Welcome to the dev-version of the [library flip on CRAN](http://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/flip/index.html)



To **install** this github version type (in R):

`library(devtools)`

`install_github("flip", "livioivil")`

(if devtools is not installed yet: `install.packages("devtools")` )


**Some examples**

```{r, message=FALSE}
library(flip)
```
An univarite analysis
```{r}
set.seed(1)
y=rnorm(10)+.5
res=flip(y)
summary(res)
plot(res) # same ad hist(res)
```

A multivarite analysis
```{r}
set.seed(1)
df=data.frame(y1=rnorm(10)+.5,y2=rnorm(10))
res=flip(~.,data=df)
summary(res)
plot(res) 
# which is different from
##set the following if you get an error (mostly using Rstudio)
#par(mar=c(1,1,1,1))
hist(res)
```


```{r}
#Same analysis but ask to store che vector of p.values
res=flip(~.,data=df,flip.return=list(permP=TRUE))


(res.npc=npc(res,flip.return=list(permP=TRUE)))
lower=res.npc@permT<=res.npc@permT[1]
plot(res,bg=c("#F98400","#F2AD00")[lower+1])
```
